inputs.text:
```json
{
  "style_name": "HyperReal Tree Pose Ascension",

  "inspiration": [
    "Alex Ross’s hyper-realistic comic book art",
    "Moebius’s organic sci-fi linework blended with photorealistic textures"
  ],

  "scene": "A hyper-detailed, graphic novel-style depiction of a woman in **Vrksasana (Tree Pose)**, her body emanating visible waves of transformative energy against a stark white void. The realism borders on photographic, yet retains the dramatic inking and composition of high-end comics.",

  "subjects": [
    {
      "type": "woman",
      "description": "athletic yet graceful, with defined muscle tone and natural skin textures (pores, subtle freckles, fine hair)",
      "position": "center, slightly off-center vertically for dynamic tension",
      "pose": "Tree Pose (one leg rooted, other foot pressed against inner thigh, hands in **Anjali Mudra** at chest or extended overhead like branches)",
      "size": "near life-sized, filling ~70% of the frame vertically",
      "expression": "eyes closed, lips parted slightly—equal parts concentration and transcendence",
      "skin_tone": "warm olive or deep melanin-rich (adjustable; avoid defaulting to light skin)",
      "clothing": "fitted, textured yoga attire (e.g., **matte black leggings with a cropped, breathable top**), slightly damp with sweat",
      "energy_interaction": "crackling energy emanates from her **chakra points** (crown, palms, soles), with visible **subtle body** (aura) shifting colors"
    },
    {
      "type": "transformative energy",
      "description": "tangible, semi-solid waves of energy resembling **bioluminescent mist or fractured glass**",
      "position": "radiating outward from her body, densest at chakra points",
      "form": "organic tendrils mixed with geometric shards (suggesting breaking through limitations)",
      "color": "gradient from **deep violet (root)** to **electric blue (throat)** to **gold (crown)**",
      "texture": "refractive, with **subsurface scattering** like ice or opal",
      "movement": "slow, pulsing expansion—some trails dissolve into **tiny floating lotus petals or sacred geometry symbols**"
    },
    {
      "type": "symbolic roots/growth",
      "description": "faint, **glowing root-like veins** extending from her standing foot into the void (implying connection to earth)",
      "position": "bottom of the frame, dissolving into the white background",
      "style": "delicate, **pen-and-ink** precision with a soft glow"
    }
  ],

  "style": "hyper-realistic graphic novel—**photorealistic textures** (skin, fabric) combined with **bold comic-book inking** (contour lines, dramatic shadows) and **painterly energy effects**",

  "color_palette": {
    "primary": "#1A1A1A",   /* Near-black (subject clothing/lines) */
    "secondary": "#8B5A9F", /* Deep amethyst (energy base) */
    "highlight": "#FFD700", /* Gold (chakra highlights) */
    "shadow": "#4A4A4A",    /* Cool gray (depth) */
    "accent": "#FFFFFF"     /* Pure white (background/energy contrast) */
  },

  "lighting": {
    "source": "**Three-point lighting**—key light from front-left (mimicking studio photography), fill light softening shadows, **backlight** creating a rim glow on the subject’s edges",
    "tone": "high contrast with **specular highlights** on skin and energy (like wet marble)",
    "effect": "energy emits its own **cool light**, casting **subtle blue-violet hues** on the subject’s skin"
  },

  "mood": "**Sacred power**—a moment of quiet intensity where human and energy merge; **awe-inspiring yet intimate**",

  "background": {
    "type": "solid with **subtle noise texture**",
    "details": "**Off-white (#F8F8F8)** with a **radial vignette** (darker at edges) to focus attention. **No ground plane**—subject appears suspended."
  },

  "composition": {
    "layout": "**Golden spiral** guiding the eye from her rooted foot, up her body, to the energy explosion at her crown",
    "framing": "vertical portrait (9:16 ratio) with **asymmetrical negative space**—more room above her head for energy expansion",
    "balance": "weight distributed unevenly (her pose mirrors the energy’s upward surge)"
  },

  "camera": {
    "angle": "**Dutch tilt (5–10 degrees)** to amplify dynamism, shot from **slightly below eye level** to emphasize height",
    "distance": "medium close-up (waist to crown in frame)",
    "lens": "**85mm prime** for flattering compression and sharp focus",
    "focus": "**Hyper-detailed subject** with **selective blur** on distant energy particles"
  },

  "medium": "**Digital painting over 3D base**—photorealistic textures (e.g., **ZBrush sculpting for skin**) combined with **hand-painted energy effects** and **comic-book cel-shading** for outlines",

  "textures": {
    "skin": "pores, fine vellus hair, **subsurface scattering** (ears/cheeks glow slightly)",
    "clothing": "**Microfiber weave** with stretch marks and **sweat sheen**",
    "energy": "**Glass-meets-smoke**—reflective yet diffuse, with **fractal noise** for depth"
  },

  "details": {
    "body": "visible **tension in muscles** (calf of standing leg, engaged core), **individual hairs** escaping her bun",
    "energy": "embedded with **tiny, ancient script symbols** (Sanskrit/alchemical) only visible on close inspection",
    "environment": "absence of gravity—**floating dust particles** caught in the energy field"
  },

  "effects": [
    "**Depth-of-field**—crisp focus on her face/hands, softening toward the energy edges",
    "**Motion lines** (comic-style) trailing her extended limbs, suggesting slow, deliberate movement",
    "**Chromatic aberration** on energy highlights for a ‘living light’ effect",
    "**Halftone patterns** in shadows (subtle, like old-school comics) for texture"
  ],

  "themes": [
    "**Embodied spirituality**—physical discipline as a vessel for transformation",
    "**Duality of strength and surrender**—rooted yet reaching, solid yet luminous"
  ],

  "usage_notes": [
    "For **print media**, enhance the **inking layer** for crisper lines at high resolution. For **digital**, animate the energy tendrils with a **gentle pulse** (2–3 sec loop).",
    "Pair with **bold, minimalist typography** (e.g., **Bebas Neue**) for titles—avoid competing with the intricate details."
  ]
}
```
